text: The Škoda Octavia is a car produced by Škoda Auto in three generations since 1996. The first generation arrived in 1996 and launched in the UK in 1998 with a facelift in 2000. The second generation was launched in 2004 with a facelift in early 2009 but the first generation still continues until 2010. It entered its third generation in 2013 with a facelift in early 2017, it received some criticism for being a bit too big for some buyers. The fourth generation launched in June 2020. == First generation (1996–2010) == === Versions === File:Škoda Octavia (LancerenoK) 2.jpg|5-door hatchback (Octavia) File:Škoda Octavia (LancerenoK) 3.jpg|5-door hatchback (Octavia) File:Skoda Octavia front 20071007.jpg|5-door station wagon (Octavia Combi) File:Skoda Octavia rear 20071007.jpg|5-door station wagon (Octavia Combi) === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.4 44 kW (60 hp) * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.6 55 kW (75 hp), 74 kW (101 hp) and 75 kW (102 hp) * 1.8 20V 92 kW (125 hp) * 1.8 20V Turbo 110 kW (150 hp) * 1.8 20V Turbo RS 132 kW (180 hp) * 2.0 85 kW (115 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.9 SDI 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.9 TDI 66 kW (90 hp), 74 kW (101 hp), 81 kW (110 hp) and 96 kW (131 hp) == Second generation (2004–2013) == === Versions === File:Škoda Octavia II.JPG|5-door hatchback (Octavia) File:Škoda Octavia II Heck.JPG|5-door hatchback (Octavia) File:2009-2010 Škoda Octavia TSI station wagon 01.jpg|5-door station wagon (Octavia Combi) File:2009-2010 Škoda Octavia TSI station wagon 02.jpg|5-door station wagon (Octavia Combi) === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.2 TSI 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp) and 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.4 TSI 90 kW (122 hp) * 1.6 MPI 75 kW (102 hp) * 1.6 FSI 85 kW (116 hp) * 1.8 TSI 118 kW (160 hp) * 2.0 FSI 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 TSI RS 147 kW (200 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.6 TDI 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.9 TDI 77 kW (105 hp) * 2.0 TDI 100 kW (136 hp) and 103 kW (140 hp) * 2.0 TDI RS 125 kW (170 hp) Octavia Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Škoda Octavia
